Programming.Heading: Do any one of the following

Task1.Title: Create a simple calculator
Task1.Description: Create a simple calculator using any programming language of your choice. The calculator should be able to perform basic arithmetic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

Task2.Title: Create a simple chat application
Task2.Description: Create a simple chat application using any programming language of your choice. The chat application should be able to send and receive messages between two users.
